2.name: 2 for you
2.description: The person who picked the card can give two slips to the person of his or her choice.

3.name: 3 for me
3.description: The person who picked the card has to drink 3 sips.

4.name: 4 to the floor
4.description: Everybody has to turn his thumb down. The last one drinks.

7.name: 7 to the heaven
7.description: Everybody has to turn his thumb up. The last one drinks.

8.name: 8 pick a mate
8.description: The person who picked the card can choose one mate that will also have to drink whenever the person has to drink (chains possible).

9.name: 9 make a rhyme
9.description: The person who picked the card chooses one word. Then in the right order; everybody says a word that rhymes with the chosen word. The first one who repeats an already said word/doesn’t find a word/etc. drinks.

10.name: 10 never have I ever
10.description: The person who picked the card tells something that he or she has never done. All the players that did the said thing have to drink.

j.name: JACK
j.description: The person who picked the card can not say "yes" or "no" until another Jack is picked. The person drinks every time he or she fails.

q.name: QUEEN
q.description: The person who picked the card chooses one category (cars, beers, etc.). Then in the right order; everybody says a word that belongs to the category (for cars : BMW, Tesla, etc.). The first one who repeats an already said word/doesn’t find a word/etc. drinks.

k.name: KING
k.description: The person that picked the card can create a new rule. (example : Everybody has to do something in particular before drinking). If someone forgets to follow the rule, he or she drinks.
